baseUrl.title: Website URL
baseUrl.description: The URL to start crawling from. Can be a homepage (https://example.com/) or a specific page.

maxPages.title: Max pages to crawl
maxPages.description: Maximum number of pages to crawl. Set higher for full site audits.

maxCrawlDepth.title: Crawl depth
maxCrawlDepth.description: How many levels deep to follow links from the starting page. Set to 10+ for full site crawls.

maxConcurrency.title: Max concurrency
maxConcurrency.description: Number of pages to crawl in parallel. Higher = faster but uses more resources.

checkExternalLinks.title: Check external links
checkExternalLinks.description: Also verify if links to external websites are working.

saveOnlyBrokenLinks.title: Save only broken links
saveOnlyBrokenLinks.description: Only save broken links to the dataset. Disable to save all links.

crawlSubdomains.title: Crawl subdomains
crawlSubdomains.description: Also crawl subdomains (e.g., blog.example.com when crawling example.com).

notificationEmails.title: Notification emails
notificationEmails.description: Email addresses to receive the broken links report.

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Proxy settings. Use for large crawls to avoid rate limiting.
